constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 127 (Friday, July 29, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CRAWFORD:
H.R. 8607
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 3 of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H7539]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Railroads, Pipelines, and Hazardous Materials.

title: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to give priority consideration for certain Department of Transportation grant programs to eligible projects that improve or build resiliency in the supply chain, and for other purposes.
